name: User Stories
tagline: This repository contains the user stories for the workshop.
body:
# Extend country filter

    As A User
    I would like to filter by all available countries
    So that I donâ€™t have to search manually    

# Link To LiveScore

    As a User
    I would like to see the source of the data
    So that I can verify it is correct

# Go to a specific date

    As a User
    I would like to go to a specific date directly
    So that I don't need to use the date buttons to get there
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
